segments.text: I'm looking at this kitchen scene, and it's quite a sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The first thing that catches my eye is the sink on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is actively running from the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's completely overflowing, spilling over the front edge in a constant sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How is she not noticing this huge waterfall?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman standing there is just polishing a plate, completely engrossed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already submerged in the puddle spreading across the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly astonishing how unaware she seems of the rising water level.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to cause some serious damage to the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the dampness spreading everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole situation is rather messy and unsettling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry she might slip and fall in that puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her concentration on that plate is absolutely unwavering.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer amount of water on the floor is incredible.
segments.speaker: PAR
